Articles.Content: There are 20 stars in the entire universe.
NASA has a lot of money!
Apollo mission used Ion propulsion and kept it as secret !
Minmus is real
None of these facts are true. We can never prove that they are. (Wrap your mind around that one.)
The water in your pineal gland flips in and out of the 4th dimension and creates reality.
Elephants fly by flapping their ears.

Did you know that Apollo 13 actually landed on the moon? They went to the south pole, where there's a huge alien base.

*adjusts tinfoil hat*
Airplanes fly when thousands of fruit flies get under it and lift it.
Actually I lied, elephants fly using the same method as airplanes. They flap their ears only to adjust course.

The Untrue Fact Telling Machine crashed on me. I didn't know what caused it until I looked inside the machine at the printed log.

GENERATING NEW FACT

THE SUN'S SPOTS ARE CAUSED BY GOD SPRINKLING JELLY ONTO HIS SPACE FORK

DISPENSING NEW FACT

GENERATING NEW FACT

THERE'S NO DIFFERENCE BETWEEN MATOR AND MATER.

DISPENSING NEW FACT

GENERATING NEW FACT

THIS IS AN UNTRUE FACT.

ERROR

DIVIDE BY ZERO ERROR.

COMMENCE SELF DESTRUCT SEQUENCE.

SELF DESTRUCT SEQUENCE CANCELED.

//I cut off the destruct sequence so I wouldn't ruin my living room.

GENERATING NEW FACT

THIS IS AN UNTRUE FACT.

DIVIDE BY ZERO ERROR.

GENERATING NEW FACT

THIS IS AN UNTRUE FACT.

DIVIDE BY ZERO ERROR.

LOGICAL LOOP DETECTED.

DEFINITELY NOT CRASHING OR ANYTHING.

JBGFEwabiAUbVGHBjehbfdsnkshnfejjNHJBHBDHWBADHJBjnjnjdhjngrjhNNNNN.

Upon reactivating the machine, it simply screamed "MURDER" in binary over and over again. (Well, that's what the Untrue Fact Telling Machine said that it said.)

Edited February 3, 2015 by GregroxMun

Did you know that cheese+a cow+milky way+3(fat/kerbal)=2.718281828+Canadian bacon=a flying pig(Spongebob-spacetimee x balloons) x 5=2

Okay, that's enough internet for one day.
